roleset.name: make or become greek
roleset.note: HELLENIZE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from hellenize.01-v)

example.name: Active
example.text: In the Hellenistic times, the Macedonians hellenized the Syrians, Jews, Egyptians, Persians, Armenians, and a number of other smaller ethnic groups along the Middle East and Central Asia.
example.arg: the Syrians, Jews, Egyptians, Persians, Armenians, and a number of other smaller ethnic groups
along the Middle East and Central Asia
